name: gas-boilerplate
description: Google Apps Script CLI boilerplate for project management

scripts.test: echo 'Tests disabled - use make validate for configuration validation'
scripts.logs: node -e "console.log('Use: make logs or check logs/ folder')"
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:preview: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push && git push --tags

author: System Administrator
